description:
Negroponty was an Alliance politician who succeeded http://anidb.net/ch743 [Job Trunicht] as the Secretary of Defence after the latter became the High Council chairman in 796 UC. In April 798 UC, he presided the hearings against http://anidb.net/ch737 [Yang Wenli]`s actions during the liberation of Heinessen from the http://anidb.net/ch6225 [National Salvation Military Council]. As the hearings were conducted around the same time the http://anidb.net/ch1534 [Empire] invaded http://anidb.net/ch1762 [Iserlohn Fortress] in the Eighth Battle of Iserlohn, Negroponty took responsibility for summoning Yang from Iserlohn and resigned as a result.
Source: Gineipaedia
name: Negroponty
